name: Cosmic Castaways
description:
In Cosmic Castaways, you play a nameless scavenger in the middle of space defending yourself from the debris from four large space wrecks  hurtling your way. Take them out and survival is yours!

Credits:

Art: Noah Gilston

Audio: Noah Gilston

Programming: Stencyl's Space Invaders template and Noah Gilston

Lyrics: Electrasy
